name: Flappy Planes
description:
Pilot a WW2 fighter plane and shoot down the attacking enemy planes!

Press space or left mouse button to fly and shoot.

Try to shoot down as many enemy planes as you can without crashing and get the highest score you can!

Coming soon to the Google Play store (Hopefully!).

More features coming soon, including a global scoreboard, sound FX and music, progression and unlockables, and more!
